responses: Use resistant verities and increase on water availability for crop vigor
Increase crop vigor by using resistant varieties and increasing water availability

patterns: Which method used for drying maize

How should I dry maize
responses: Use solar drying, tarpaulins or cemented floor free from dust
You can use solar drying. Using tarpaulins or a dust-free concrete floor are also some good options.

responses: Use Solar driers

responses: Broad cast or apply around individual plant
